Package com.intellij.openapi.fileTypes

Interface SyntaxHighlighter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BuildoutCfgSyntaxHighlighter, CommandLineSyntaxHighlighter, CustomFileHighlighter, FileTemplateHighlighter, GroovyDocSyntaxHighlighter, GroovySyntaxHighlighter, HtmlFileHighlighter, IgnoreLanguageHighlighter, JavaFileHighlighter, JqlHighlighter, MarkdownSyntaxHighlighter, PlainSyntaxHighlighter, PropertiesHighlighter, PropertiesValueHighlighter, PyHighlighter, RegExpHighlighter, RestSyntaxHighlighter, RncHighlighter, ShSyntaxHighlighter, SyntaxHighlighterBase, SyntaxHighlighterOverEditorHighlighter, TemplateDataHighlighterWrapper, TextMateHighlighter, XmlFileHighlighter, XPathHighlighter, YAMLSyntaxHighlighter

    public interface SyntaxHighlighter
    Controls the syntax highlighting of a file. Extend SyntaxHighlighterBase.
    See Also:
    SyntaxHighlighterFactory.getSyntaxHighlighter(com.intellij.openapi.project.Project, com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile), SyntaxHighlighterFactory.getSyntaxHighlighter(com.intellij.lang.Language, com.intellij.openapi.project.Project, com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile)

    • Field Detail

      • EP_NAME

        static final ExtensionPointName<KeyedFactoryEPBean> EP_NAME

      • PROVIDER

        @Deprecated
static final SyntaxHighlighterProvider PROVIDER
        Deprecated. see SyntaxHighlighterFactory.getSyntaxHighlighter(com.intellij.openapi.project.Project, com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile) and SyntaxHighlighterFactory.getSyntaxHighlighter(com.intellij.lang.Language, com.intellij.openapi.project.Project, com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile)

    • Method Detail

      • getHighlightingLexer

        Lexer getHighlightingLexer()
        Returns the lexer used for highlighting the file. The lexer is invoked incrementally when the file is changed, so it must be capable of saving/restoring state and resuming lexing from the middle of the file.
        Returns:
        The lexer implementation.

      • getTokenHighlights

        TextAttributesKey [] getTokenHighlights(IElementType tokenType)
        Returns the list of text attribute keys used for highlighting the specified token type. The attributes of all attribute keys returned for the token type are successively merged to obtain the color and attributes of the token.
        Parameters:
        tokenType - The token type for which the highlighting is requested.
        Returns:
        The array of text attribute keys.
